3D Annotations

VisIt has a number of controls, located on the 3D Options tab, in the Annotation Window for controlling annotations that are used when the visualization window contains 3D plots. Like the 2D controls, these controls focus mainly on the axes that are drawn around plots. Figure9-5 shows an example 3D plot with the 3D annotations labeled and Figure9-6 shows the Annotation Window's 3D Options tab.
